abstract: Ron Pillar, former head of JPMorgan Chase‘s technology investment banking group, has joined the boutique firm Ladenburg Thalmann as vice chairman, head of the institutional client group and a head of investment banking, the firm said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Ron Pillar, former head of JPMorgan Chase‘s technology investment banking group, has joined the boutique firm Ladenburg Thalmann as vice chairman, head of the institutional client group and a head of investment banking, the firm said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Ex-Banker for JPMorgan Tech Joins Ladenburg
